changeSet.sql: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS PG_TRGM;

changeSet.author: nscuro@protonmail.com
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY IF NOT EXISTS "COMPONENT_DIRECT_DEPENDENCIES_GIN_IDX" ON "COMPONENT" USING GIN ("DIRECT_DEPENDENCIES" GIN_TRGM_OPS);
